title: Remove/hide old pages (suites, old runs)
description: Clean up the frontend by removing or hiding legacy pages that are no longer needed. This includes old suite management pages and runs pages that have been replaced by the new eval-runs workflow. Simplify navigation to focus on the core user flow.
acceptance_criteria: Remove or hide /suites page and related components
Update sidebar navigation to remove old links
Redirect old routes to new equivalents where appropriate
Remove unused components related to old pages
Ensure no broken links in the application
